scripts.test: bash -lc "cd frontend && pnpm test -- --run && cd ../src-tauri && cargo test"
scripts.test:parallel:acceptance: bash -lc "set +e; (cd frontend && CI=1 pnpm test -- --run) & frontend_pid=\$!; (cd src-tauri && cargo test) & rust_pid=\$!; wait \$frontend_pid; frontend_code=\$?; wait \$rust_pid; rust_code=\$?; echo frontend_unit=\$frontend_code; echo rust_unit=\$rust_code; if [ \$frontend_code -eq 0 ] && [ \$rust_code -eq 0 ]; then exit 0; fi; exit 1"
scripts.dev:test: bash -lc "cd frontend && VITE_USE_HTTP=true pnpm run dev"
